text: Phuket Top Team is a mixed martial arts training gym based in Phuket, Thailand. The gym features professional fighters who have competed in many promotions like the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) and Bellator. == History == The gym was founded in 2012 by Boyd Clarke. == Phuket Dreaming == The gym is also known for the Phuket Dreaminghttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URB0Mfq3UHw&list;=PLE2g9D9HVlnuTH1pUPwzqgu2m82LqWWEq webseries. == Notable fighters== Vaughan Lee - former UFC fighter Lerdsila \- multiple-time Muay Thai champion Xiong Jingnan \- ONE champion Cris Cyborg - current Bellator and former UFC champion Luke Jumeau \- UFC fighter Anthony Leone - former Bellator fighter Krzysztof Jotkohttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lf-mkLDgfIc \- UFC fighter ==References== ==External links== * Category:Kickboxing training facilities Category:Mixed martial arts training facilities Category:Kickboxing in Thailand
title: Phuket Top Team
